snippet.title: Flight Catastrophe
snippet.description:
Prevent the plane crash and save people's lives in "Flight Catastrophe" 
a game where every decision matters! Identify the threats, 
command the crew, and act fast!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1371550/Flight_Catastrophe/
